definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Digital image steganography does have some drawbacks, though.
sentences.chinese: 但是，數碼圖像隱寫術仍然有一定缺點。

sentences.english: If only I could get out of my timidness, I would feel better.
sentences.chinese: 只要我改掉自己膽怯的缺點，我就能感覺好點。

sentences.english: The cracks and flaws in Mary's old performance have been skillfully varnished over.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗以往表演中的一些缺點都被巧妙地掩飾過去了。

sentences.english: The drawbacks and the development trend of PLSS are put forward in the end.
sentences.chinese: 最後，提出了其存在的缺點和未來發展方向。

sentences.english: All races have their pluses and their minuses and asian people are just the same.
sentences.chinese: 所有種族都有自己的缺點和優點，亞洲人也是如此。

sentences.english: Each has its advantages and disadvantages.
sentences.chinese: 每種儲存機制都有優缺點。

sentences.english: The kep overcomes the defect that the original door has low coefficient of a safety tool.
sentences.chinese: 克服了原有門安全工具係數小的缺點。

sentences.english: The downside is that you’ll lose at least a few additional inches of ceiling height.
sentences.chinese: 缺點是你可能會額外的失去幾英寸的頭頂空間淨高。

sentences.english: But there are trade-offs, and cloud computing is not without its warts.
sentences.chinese: 但是，有得必有失，雲計算並非沒有缺點。

sentences.english: The disadvantages are the low data rates and a relatively long connection time.
sentences.chinese: 缺點是低資料速率和一個相對較長的連接時間。

sentences.english: Disadvantages to this approach are apparent in the increased complexity and maintenance effort.
sentences.chinese: 此方法的缺點在於明顯地增加了複雜性和維護工作。

sentences.english: Its main disadvantage is that it is non - absorbent.
sentences.chinese: 它的主要缺點是無吸收性。

sentences.english: The young worker found a lot of shortcomings in himself and he set about getting rid of it.
sentences.chinese: 那位青年工人發現身上有不少缺點，就着手進行改正。

sentences.english: The boy plays up his strong points and minimizes his weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 這男孩誇大自己的長處，極力縮小自己的缺點。

sentences.english: Zero-coupon securities have little risk, but they do have a few tax disadvantages.
sentences.chinese: 零息債券沒有什麼風險，但他們確實有少數稅務缺點。

sentences.english: The other major downside is with the new health care plan that's being implemented.
sentences.chinese: 其他的缺點就是關於新的醫療保健計劃的實施。

definition: only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
